title: Chinese style chicken and sweetcorn soup
ingredients: ['50g (2 oz) butter', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '1 red onion', '2 corn on the cob (or 1 large tin of sweetcorn)', '2 cloves garlic', '2 tablespoons Chinese cooking wine', '3 tablespoons dark soy sauce', 'leftover meat from 1 chicken (or 4 cooked chicken legs), skinned', '1 bay leaf', '1 litre (1 3/4 pints) chicken stock', 'squeeze of orange juice', 'black pepper to taste']
